skills.title: React JS
skills.description: React JS, a powerful front-end library, simplifies UI development with a component-based approach for building dynamic and interactive websites.

skills.title: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS, a server-side runtime, excels in scalability, offering a non-blocking I/O model for efficient, high-performance network applications.

skills.title: Mongo DB
skills.description: MongoDB, a NoSQL database, provides flexibility in data storage with JSON-like documents, offering scalability and ease of integration.

skills.title: Express JS
skills.description: Express JS, a minimalist web app framework for Node.js, streamlines development, making it ideal for creating robust and efficient web applications.
